title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Prioritizing Improvement Elements for Indonesian Health Education e-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic e-learning utilization skills and intermediate expertise in health education
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically prioritize e-learning improvement factors using the survey-based weighted analysis (DUP-We) methodology.
Learners can perform difficulty-usability weighted analysis on 10 e-learning elements, including learning design, content types, and interaction tools.
The analysis results can be visualized using a pyramid model and an actionable improvement roadmap can be proposed
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
